title: Set up IRS Installment Agreement
description: A taxpayer owes taxes but cannot pay the full amount at once. They want to set up a monthly payment plan with the IRS.

tasks.description: Determine the total tax amount owed by the taxpayer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the final balance due.

tasks.description: Check the taxpayer's eligibility for the Online Payment Agreement (OPA) program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the taxpayer meets the criteria for a streamlined installment agreement.

tasks.description: Complete and submit Form 9465, Installment Agreement Request, with the tax return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully prepares and files the request for a payment plan.
